channel.title: Npc talking please read!
channel.description:
Hello,
I would just like to know what exact files i need for the npc talking when i click and npc,
Because ive added the npcid and then the npcdialouge and also added it to the clickingmost.java but the npc will still not talk.
Please help
Thank you

item.title: Npc talking please read!
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

Search for what they say when you click them on Client.java, i think it’'s there. if it’s not then i’m sorry , i’ll figure it out sooner or later.

Read full topic
